June 21, 2015 D Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik)
Regionalmusiktag - BMVTGOG, SO (Marschmusik) 0 March Contest
regionalmusiktag-bmvtgog-so-marschmusik
Balsthal, SO, Switzerland > held on June 20th & 21th
totally 31 participating Bands (mixed ranking Brass/Wind but separated Sat & Sun; Draws till 19 played on Saturday; 1 Band No-Contest)
May 23, 2014, 7:36 p.m. Aug. 30, 2015, 1:59 p.m.
1 Musikgesellschaft Konkordia Aedermannsdorf Bernhard Wüthrich March: Marche du Dragon
2 Brass Band Matzendorf Marcel Bossert March: Gandria
3 Brass Band Kappel Oliver Waldmann March: Schwyzer Soldaten
5 Musikgesellschaft Winznau Fabian Bloch March: Feurig Blut
6 Brass Band Frohsinn Laupersdorf Wolfgang Nussbaumer March: Parade-Defilier-Marsch
6 Brass Band Solothurn Martin Bütikofer March: Bundesrat Gnägi-Marsch
9 MV Herbetswil Hans Burkhalter March: Viva Arogno
16 Brass Band Wolfwil Emerita Blum-Duss March: Solothurner Marsch
